Actions.Effects: Characters adjacent to the [name] in the area take double damage and are shoved 3.

Actions.Name: Lock
Actions.Effects: The [name] throws a bola at a foe in range. That foe either takes 4 damage or becomes weakened and slashed (foe chooses).

Actions.Name: Stock
